content:
Please can I request further review for https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/pull/18517? It's a blocker for https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/2508 .

Thanks!

Christopher
I pushed some golfs, it would be great if someone else could give it a final review
It's not clear to me whether preserves_lub_on_directed is a useful enough definition to live there rather than in the scott topology file
